column1: vegetable oil
egg
head cabbage

mushroom

Lunar New Year
Heat 1 teaspoon vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium heat.
Pour in beaten eggs and cook
Flip the eggs over and cook for an additional 20 seconds to firm the other side.
Set egg pancake aside to cool
Heat the remaining vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Stir in cabbage and carrot; cook for 2 minutes to wilt.
Add bamboo
Continue cooking until the vegetables soften
Stir in sliced egg
column2: then spread mixture out onto a pan

column1: To assemble the egg rolls
column2: place a wrapper onto your work surface with one corner pointing towards you.

column1: Place about 3 tablespoons of cooled filling in a heap onto the bottom third of the wrapper.
Brush a little beaten egg white onto the top two edges of the wrapper
Fold the bottom corner over the filling and roll firmly to the halfway point.
Fold the left and right sides snugly over the egg roll
column2: then continue rolling until the top corners seal the egg roll with the egg white.

column1: Repeat with remaining egg roll wrappers
column2: covering finished egg rolls with plastic wrap to keep from drying out.

column1: Heat about 6-inches of oil in a wok or deep-fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Fry egg rolls 3 or 4 at a time until golden brown
column2: 5 to 7 minutes. Drain on paper towels.
